earner.translation[0].definitions[0].def: someone who earns money for the job that they do
earner.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: He is the only wage earner in the family.
Private childcare is still too expensive for the average earner.
earner.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a business or activity which makes a profit
earner.translation[1].definitions[0].def: someone who earns money by working
earner.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: He’s the highest earner in the company at the moment.
It is hard when there is only onewage earner in the family.
Private healthcare is too expensive for the average earner.
earner.translation[1].definitions[1].def: an investment or asset that earns money
earner.translation[1].definitions[1].exa: The Suez Canal is one of Egypt’s main foreign exchange earners.
earner.translation[1].definitions[2].def: something that earns quite a lot of money for you
earner.translation[1].definitions[2].exa: The shop could be quite a nice little earner.
